Reviews.Title: I love it
Reviews.Author: Angel Hartzell
Reviews.Content: Everything came as it said it would. The camera is awesome i love it, I'm so glad I got rechargeable batteries. The tripod works great and everything else came as it said it would. Im very happy with this purchase.

ProductInfo.Features:
KIT INCLUDES 11 PRODUCTS -- All BRAND NEW Items with all Manufacturer-supplied Accessories + Full USA Warranties:
<1> Nikon Coolpix L620 Digital Camera (Black) + <2> Transcend 32GB SDHC 300x Card +
<3> PD 4x AA Batteries & Charger + <4> AA / AAA Battery Case + <5> Lowepro Ridge 30 Camera Case +
<6> Zeikos 50" Compact Tripod + <7> HDMI to Micro-HDMI Cable (6') + <8> PD 5pc Complete Cleaning Kit +
<9> PD Memory Card Storage Wallet + <10> Image Recovery Software + <11> LCD Screen Protectors
ProductInfo.Name: Nikon Coolpix L620 Digital Camera (Black) with 32GB Card + Case + Batteries & Charger + Tripod + HDMI Cable + Accessory Kit
